Detailed Description

template<class NumberStarStar, class LargeNumber>
class QuantileNormalization< NumberStarStar, LargeNumber >

first parameter is a nested pointer **p is a number *p is a sample; the second parameter should be a numeric type that can contain the sum of all the numbers in all the samples Also see: Quantile Normalization

NumberStarStar is a nested pointer. (**Number) //! LargeNumber is a type which can contain the sum of all the samples.
